src:
USA-börserna fortsätter uppåt i öppningen – men Uber rasar
USA-börserna fortsatte uppåt när handeln inleddes på tisdagen. Strax efter öppning stiger Nasdaq 0,1 procent, S&P 500 klättrar 0,1 procent medan Dow Jones avancerar 0,2 procent.
05 Nov 2019, 14:04 by Victor Hultgren, Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

text:
US stock exchanges continue up in the opening - but Uber is crashing
The US stock exchanges continued upward when trading began on Tuesday. Shortly after opening, the Nasdaq rises 0.1 percent, the S&P 500 climbs 0.1 percent while Dow Jones advances 0.2 percent.
05 Nov 2019, 14:04 by Victor Hultgren, News Agency Direct
